title: Radical 163
text:
Radical 163 or radical city () meaning "<a href="city">city</a>" is one of the 20 <a href="Kangxi%20radical">Kangxi radical</a>s (214 radicals in total) composed of 7 <a href="stroke%20%28CJK%20character%29">strokes</a>. This radical character transforms into (counted as 3 strokes in Traditional Chinese, 2 strokes in Simplified Chinese) when used as a right component (not to be confused with on the left derived from ).
In the "<a href="Kangxi%20Dictionary">Kangxi Dictionary</a>", there are 350 characters (out of 49,030) to be found under this <a href="Radical%20%28Chinese%20characters%29">radical</a>.
 is also the 159th indexing component in the "<a href="Table%20of%20Indexing%20Chinese%20Character%20Components">Table of Indexing Chinese Character Components</a>" predominantly adopted by <a href="Simplified%20Chinese%20characters">Simplified Chinese</a> dictionaries published in <a href="mainland%20China">mainland China</a>, with (right) listed as its associated indexing components.
